description: Frej is a non-profit think tank located in a major city, focused on promoting sustainable practices within the food system. Established by a group of students seven years ago, it has grown to employ around 20 full-time staff members. The organization acts as a bridge between various stakeholders, producing knowledge, hosting events, and providing policy advice to foster collaboration. Their mission is to transform the food system while engaging the public and addressing the divide between urban and rural communities. Funding relies on grants, which are crucial for their ongoing projects.
name: Frej
